message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $950000. This is a great deal for both of us, as it's well below what it's worth to me and still leaves you with a substantial profit. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and pay $900000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer. While I'm open to negotiation, $900000 is still a bit below my target. To make this work for both of us, I'm willing to come down to $925000. This reflects the value of the product and gives you a good deal. Let's finalize this and make it happen!
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and pay $915000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
